member.summary: Enums holding the possible cacheable tables for the Petra Personnel Module, specifically Unit submodule

member.summary: List of all campaigns

member.summary: List of all conferences

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheableUnitTablesEnum.PositionList
member.summary: Contains the different position which exist within our organisation, e.g. Field Leader, Book Keeper, Computer support

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheableUnitTablesEnum.JobAssignmentTypeList
member.summary: Describes whether a person is full-time, part-time, etc

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheableUnitTablesEnum.LeavingCodeList
member.summary: Describes the reason a person left a particular position

member.name: T:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum
member.summary: Enums holding the possible cacheable tables for the Petra Personnel Module, specifically Person submodule

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.CommitmentStatusList
member.summary: Contains the statuses that are be used for commitments

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.DocumentTypeList
member.summary: Contains the codes that indicate the types of documents for a person

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.DocumentTypeCategoryList
member.summary: Contains the codes that indicate the categories of document types (grouping)

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.AbilityAreaList
member.summary: Contains the codes that indicate the areas of ability for a Person

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.AbilityLevelList
member.summary: Contains the degrees to which an ability is possessed, e.g. a little or professional

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.ApplicantStatusList
member.summary: Contains the different codes that indicate where an applicant is in the application continuum

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.ArrivalDeparturePointList
member.summary: Contains the codes used to indicate where the conferee is arriving or departing

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.EventRoleList
member.summary: Contains the codes that indicate a person's role and/or position at conferences and xyz_tbds

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.ContactList
member.summary: Contains the various methods by which a person learns of our organsiation. This table can be changed to fit any field's partiular awareness programs

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.DriverStatusList
member.summary: Contains the codes that indicate the level of ability a drive has

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.LanguageLevelList
member.summary: Contains the degrees to which a language is spoken, e.g. a little, phrases, fluent

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.LeadershipRatingList
member.summary: Contains the codes indicating the leadership potential of someone

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.PartyTypeList
member.summary: Contains the codes indicating whether groups should be together and for how long

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.PassportTypeList
member.summary: Contains the codes that indicate the type of passport a person holds

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.TransportTypeList
member.summary: Contains the codes that indicate the mode of travel being used

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.QualificationAreaList
member.summary: Contains the areas in which a person may posess a qualification, e.g. computing or accountancy

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.QualificationLevelList
member.summary: Contains the levels to which a qualifications is possessed, e.g. Secondary education, Master's Degree

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.ValuableItemList
member.summary: Contains the item(s) of value a person may possess which need to be accounted for various purposes, e.g. customs, or insurance

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.VisionAreaList
member.summary: Contains the areas a person may have vision for, e.g. children's work or a particular country

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.VisionLevelList
member.summary: Contains the levels to which a vision is possessed, e.g. a possibility, do nothing else

member.name: F:Ict.Petra.Shared.MPersonnel.TCacheablePersonTablesEnum.XyzTbdPreferenceLevelList
member.summary: Describes the importance of the country and target choices
